---
title: "Excel-convertion"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(repeatData)
library(writexl)


##convert dataframes to Excel files

final.data.xl <- final.data %>% 
   filter(!id %in% c(6,11, 20, 21, 25, 35, 37, 52, 53, 54, 56, 57),
         !period %in% c(3),
         !group %in% ("control")) %>% 
  print()


write_xlsx(final.data.xl, file.path(getwd(), "final_data.xlsx"))
  

session.data.xl <- session.data %>% 
  filter(!id %in% c(6,11, 20, 21, 25, 35, 37, 52, 53, 54, 56, 57),
         !period %in% c(3, 4, 5, 6)) %>% 
  print()

write_xlsx(session.data.xl, file.path(getwd(), "session_data.xlsx"))





```
